name: a berserker potion
effect: swigs the potion that tastes mysteriously like piss... their eyes turn red as they let out a terrifying roar!
+20dmg and +15% bonus crit chance on the next fight/monsterhunt!
descr: this potion might taste like the piss of a person who is severely dehydrated... - 20 bonus damage and +15% critical chance for your next monsterhunt or bar brawl

name: the blood of Passport
effect: pours passports special needs blood into a sippy cup and enjoys it thoroughly!
DOUBLE XP next time you claim /dailyxp!
descr: ahhh... there is nothing like the taste of the blood of Passport - you gain double XP next time you do /dailyxp

name: a fresh pair of undies
effect: slides out of their damp shit-caked undies and puts on a brand new pair!
ahh such a quality of life upgrade - instant +150XP!
descr: lets be real and appreciate how great unsoiled underwear is... - you instantly gain +100xp

name: some nookie
effect: walks down the street and happens upon some nookie!
descr: oh, you dirty badger! you got your paws on some nookie from a lucky someone! - you instantly gain +69xp

name: 15mins of fame
effect: got their time in the limelight but now it's over... exhilirating while it lasted but now that feeling is replaced by emptiness and disillusionment
instant +50XP at least so you got that going for ya
descr: for a limited time you thought you had it all, that you were doing something right with your life... but then someone pulled the red rug from underneath your feet - you instantly gain +50xp

name: a decent psyop
effect: got all of their active consumable items removed!!
descr: this psyop is a decent one because it works for like 5minutes - but sometimes that is all the time you need in the world to get what you want! - you dispel all active effects on target user (for example berserker potion or blood of Passport)

name: an m3 bradley battletank
effect: gathers his crew of strong 19 year old marines and hops in a FUCKING ARMORED TANK, BOIII WTF
they are INVULNERABLE and gets +25dmg for the next monsterhunt/fight
descr: it's a frickin armor plated battletank with a fat cannon and a crew of battle hardened marines! - frickin' invulnerability & you get +25damage for next fight/monsterhunt

name: a supersoaker filled with piss
effect: pumps their super soaker and shoots a lukewarm stream of deep yellow piss all over
is fuckin drenched and gets an INSTANT -150XP!
descr: pump it up & aim... to give a special someone a golden shower - target user instantly lose -150xp

name: withdrawals from hard drugs
effect: hides the drugs in a super secret location and inducing withdrawals in
descr: stash the hard drugs somewhere where they cant find em to induce serious, potentially lifethreatening withdrawals! - target user gets -20damage for next fight/monsterhunt
